p:
It was found that before death, the level of neutrophil count, D‐dimer, blood urea and creatinine levels of COVID‐19 patients continued to increase and the lymphocyte counts continued to decrease. These changes were related to cytokine storm, suggesting the activation of coagulation system, continuous inflammatory response and the occurrence of acute kidney injury, which could be involved into the pathogenesis of COVID‐19 exacerbation and explain the death of COVID‐19 patients.
